constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: ART4 Name: St. John's Industrial Area
LOCIND Name: St. John's Industrial Area
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Full planning permission for the proposed demolition of the existing buildings on site and the construction of residential apartments (Use Class C3), alongside associated landscaping, communal amenity space, car and cycle parking, refuse/recycling facilities and plant areas, together with access from Leigh Close.
